instructions: Open iTunes Under Library on the left pane, click on Apps Right-click on any app and choose Show in Finder Alternatively, you can find them by going to: User/Music/iTunes/Mobile Applications

Open iTunes Under Library on the left pane, click on Apps Right-click on any app and choose Show on Windows Explorer Alternatively, you can find them by going to: C:\Users\User\Music\iTunes\iTunes Media\Mobile Applications
